title: Is Lavender's Blue Dilly Dilly a light music? I have a competition in school. - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, in my opinion, Lavender’s Blue Dilly Dilly is light music as it is both calm and peaceful. I think it is quite appropriate as something that is soothing to hear and gives out tranquil vibes and relaxes the listener. You can sing it in the competition if you want. Peace. :)

Yes… but It is kind of childish… There are so many calm songs, for example, Kill em with Kindness by Selena Gomez A Place In This World Acoustic Version by Taylor Swift This is me piano version by Demi Lovato etc. But It's you who’s gonna participatie so your choice songs matters the most. Do Your Best💕💕
